bibliography:
n.d.a., ‘Reactions to Determinism’, Typescript, no date,
5 pages, Bodleian Library Prior Archive.
[Prior n.d.a. available online]

n.d.b., ‘Determinism in Philosophy and in Theology’,
Typescript, 4 pages, Bodleian Library Prior Archive.
[Prior n.d.b. available online]

n.d.c., ‘The Case of Edward Irving’, typescript, 5
pages, Bodleian Library Prior Archive (Box 6), (In the secondary literature this
item is sometimes cited as ‘Prior 1942’ but in fact the
date is uncertain.)

1931, ‘Essays Literary’, Typescript, 157 pages,
Macmillan Brown Library, University of Canterbury.

1934, ‘Athanasius Contra Mundum’, Open
Windows, vol. 8, no. 4, pp. 6–7.

1935, ‘Logic and Dogma’, Open Windows, vol. 9,
no. 5, p. 19.

1937a, ‘What is Socialism?’, Four letters to the
Otago Daily Times under the pseudonym ‘Independent
Labour’, dated 6 July, 10 July, 15 July, 20 July.
[6 July,
10 July,
15 July, and
20 July 
available online]

1937b, ‘The Nation and the Individual’,
Australasian Journal of Psychology and Philosophy, vol. 15,
pp. 294–298.

1938, ‘Hitler Comes to the Tyrol’, under the nom de
plume John Everdean, with Clare Prior, Otago Daily Times, 18
June, p. 4.
[Prior 1938 available online]

1939, ‘The Czech Church in Exile’, The Christian
World, 13 June, p. 4.

1940, ‘Missions and the Home Front’, International
Review of Missions, July, pp. 340–352.

1941, ‘Some Mail Gone Missing’, Outlook,
February 26, pp. 10–11.

1942a, ‘Can Religion be Discussed?’, Australasian
Journal of Psychology and Philosophy, vol. 20, pp. 141–151.

1942b, Untitled manuscript, 7 pages, 25 March, Bodleian Library
Prior Archive (Box 7).

1944, ‘The Meaning of Good’, Australasian Journal

1945, ‘The Subject of Ethics’, Australasian Journal
of Psychology and Philosophy, vol. 23, pp. 78–84.

1947, ‘Supralapsarianism’, The Presbyter, vol.
5, pp. 19–22.

1949, Logic and the Basis of Ethics, Oxford: Clarendon

1951, The Craft of Formal Logic, typescript, 772 pages + 4

1952a, ‘Modality De Dicto and Modality De Re’,
Theoria, vol. 18, pp. 174–180.

1952b, ‘In What Sense is Modal Logic Many-Valued?’,

1952c, ‘Łukasiewicz’s Symbolic Logic’,

1952d, ‘The Parva Logicalia in Modern Dress’,

1953, ‘Three-Valued Logic and Future Contingents’,
